channel.title: [pi] Ranging Distance Tile Help? [Easy Fix]
channel.description:
Hey, here again with another problem on my remake.
So, everytime i ranged it seems that i start following the npc, which can be a problem because you can't safespot if you do this. So
I need help with Ranged Distance Tile, what java file is it on?
